item.description:
I decided to post this as a meet up so people can communicate about
carpools if they want-

Please sign up for the meeting here:
http://groups.drupal....
Link can also be used to suggest agenda items-

We need people to present items on the proposed agenda - see below. If you want to present one of these items, please note that in the comments to this meeting (or just email me directly: rick@flowmediadesign.com) and I will put your name by the agenda item. Also, if you want to add an item to the agenda, do same.

1. How version control works: Subversion (and maybe CVS) - anyone? 2. A look at Drupal 6 - anyone?
3. Using CCK and Views - (Rick Hood, if no one else wants to do)
4. Using the Domain Access module - Rick Hood

Finding Room:
Webster has no sign identifying it - look for the building with "Geology" above the door and a series of names carved in the stone band in between the first and second floors. As with last time, there's wifi available for guests, a projector, and workstations, along with ample seating.

Here's a google map view of the college campus, and here's a screencap with Webster, the Lord Jeff, and the campus loop map highlighted.

Read more: http://groups.drupal....

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Western Mass Drupal Meetup
